metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart and Wyll banter while journeying. Shadowheart mentions how Wyll's method of training the tiefling children in the grove is quite different to how she was trained herself.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: I saw you training those children. You were so gentle! That's... not how I was taught.
1.context: NodeContext: A little resentment that she didn't have an empathic teacher like Wyll when she was growing up.

3.speaker: Wyll
3.text: Cruel words strengthen neither heads nor hearts, Shadowheart.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: I wouldn't quite say that - I learned the lesson, after all.
2.context: NodeContext: Defensive - 'I turned out all right'

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: And came to resent your tutor, I bet. I taught them to fight - not to hate.
